title: The Original Seeker - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Mature   Mystery   Xuanhuan
tags: Apathetic Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Cruel Characters   Cultivation   Curses   Evil Protagonist   Heroes   Kingdoms   Leadership   Legends   Male Protagonist   Mutations   Outer Space   Psychic Powers   Ruthless Protagonist   Skill Creation   Soldiers   Soul Power   Special Abilities   Vampires   Wars   Weak to Strong
author: Earl Orange   橘子伯爵
description:
Bai Mo, you evil bastard! 

'Only the weakling will care about race and lineage, that’s because they need to see something that is similar to themselves to feel safe. And they need to use another life to continue their dreams; But the sun doesn't need another sun, and the eternal one doesn't need another to realize his own dreams.'

A story of a lone seeker constantly searching for a way forward.>
